Project.Name: CY8CKIT_046_Deep_Sleep_Blinky
Project.Description: This example demonstrates DeepSleep power mode operation of PSoC 4200L device. The PSoC 4200L device is put to DeepSleep power mode and wakes up every 1 second. In addition, this example uses the ILO Trim Component to trim the ILO to an accuracy of (+/-10%) using IMO.
